mechanics.trigger: Creature attempts to move or benefit from speed bonuses
mechanics.condition: Creature is affected by Restrained condition
mechanics.outcome: Creature's speed becomes 0 and cannot benefit from speed bonuses

mechanics.trigger: Attack roll made against affected creature
mechanics.condition: Target creature is affected by Restrained condition
mechanics.outcome: Attack rolls against the target have Advantage

mechanics.trigger: Attack roll made by affected creature
mechanics.condition: Attacker is affected by Restrained condition

mechanics.trigger: Dexterity saving throw made by affected creature
mechanics.condition: Creature is affected by Restrained condition
mechanics.outcome: Creature has Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws

description_text: A restrained creature's speed becomes 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage. The creature has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.
